WITH RECURSIVE Months (month_number) AS ( SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT month_number + 1 FROM Months WHERE month_number < 12 ) SELECT Months.month_number, COALESCE(COUNT(DISTINCT order_info_table.order_uid), 0) AS order_count, COALESCE(COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN order_info_table.order_status = 1 THEN order_info_table.order_uid END), 0) AS valid_count FROM Months LEFT JOIN order_info_table ON Months.month_number = MONTH(order_info_table.order_time) GROUP BY Months.month_number ORDER BY Months.month_number;
